examples.korean: The walls of the vault were plated with steel. 발음듣기 그 지하 금고 벽에는 강철판이 둘러져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The walls of the vault were plated with steel. 발음

examples.korean: The towers are made of steel cased in granite. 발음듣기 그 탑들은 화강암으로 완전히 둘러싸인 강철로 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The towers are made of steel cased in granite. 발음

examples.korean: an iron and steel works 발음듣기 철과 강철로 된 건조물 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an iron and steel works 발음

examples.korean: a cold, steely voice 발음듣기 차갑고 강철 같은 목소리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a look of steely determination 발음듣기 강철같이 결의에 찬 표정 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a look of steely determination 발음
